org.cpsolver.exam.heuristics

Class ExamNeighbourSelection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cpsolver.ifs.assignment.context.NeighbourSelectionWithContext<Exam,ExamPlacement,ExamNeighbourSelection.Context>
      • org.cpsolver.exam.heuristics.ExamNeighbourSelection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CanHoldContext, HasAssignmentContext<Exam,ExamPlacement,ExamNeighbourSelection.Context>, NeighbourSelection<Exam,ExamPlacement>, TerminationCondition<Exam,ExamPlacement>

    public class ExamNeighbourSelection
extends NeighbourSelectionWithContext<Exam,ExamPlacement,ExamNeighbourSelection.Context>
implements TerminationCondition<Exam,ExamPlacement>
    Examination timetabling neighbour selection.

    It consists of the following three phases:
    • Construction phase (ExamConstruction until all exams are assigned)
    • Hill-climbing phase (HillClimber until the given number if idle iterations)
    • Simulated annealing phase (SimulatedAnnealing until timeout is reached)
      • Or great deluge phase (when Exam.GreatDeluge is true, GreatDeluge until timeout is reached)
    • At the end (when TerminationCondition.canContinue(Solution) is false), the search is finished with one sweep of final phase ( HillClimber until the given number if idle iterations).


    Version:
    ExamTT 1.3 (Examination Timetabling)

      • selectNeighbour

        public Neighbour<Exam,ExamPlacement> selectNeighbour(Solution<Exam,ExamPlacement> solution)
        Neighbour selection. It consists of the following three phases:
        • Construction phase (ExamConstruction until all exams are assigned)
        • Hill-climbing phase (HillClimber until the given number if idle iterations)
        • Simulated annealing phase (SimulatedAnnealing until timeout is reached)
        Specified by:
        selectNeighbour in interface NeighbourSelection<Exam,ExamPlacement>
        Parameters:
        solution - given solution
        Returns:
        a neighbour assignment
